body.p:
Richmond Ky
July 11th 1861
Gov. B. MaGoffin
Dear Sir --

About two weeks since the resignation of E. K. Howard a Justice of the Peace in Madison County was forwarded to you by the Judge of our county court & with it a petition numerously signed requesting the appointment of W. S. Taylor to fill the vacancy -- No reply has been received & at the request of the parties interested I write to you to solicit that you reply immediately to the aforementioned petition -- The Justice of the peace having resigned on account of ill health there is consequently no Justice for that district & the neighborhood is very anxious that you should appiont W. S. Taylor

Madison Co
Dist No 8.
J. P.
W. S. Taylor
Comd July 25. 1861

Madison Co
Jas. B. McCreary
written to
July 19. 1861
